languages.text: "Его Светлость давно уже демонстрирует подверженность... развращающим идеям. Его утрата интереса к управлению своим протекторатом и тяга к насилию давно уже вызвали мое внимание". {n}Помедлив, Калькасар все же добавляет:{/n} "Единственный вопрос, на который у меня пока нет ответа — сколько именно агентов Архиврага проникло в его окружение".

"His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."
languages.original_text: "Его Светлость давно уже демонстрирует подверженность... развращающим идеям. Его утрата интереса к управлению своим протекторатом и тяга к насилию давно уже вызвали мое внимание". {n}Помедлив, Калькасар все же добавляет:{/n} "Единственный вопрос, на который у меня пока нет ответа — сколько именно агентов Архиврага проникло в его окружение".

His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

"His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

languages.text: “那位大人一直以来都很容易受到……腐化思想的影响。他没有兴趣管理他的属地，而且他渴望暴力，这种情况很久之前就引起了我的注意。”{n}卡尔卡扎犹豫片刻，之后补充道。{/n}“我唯一不清楚的问题是：他的随从之中，究竟混进了多少混沌大敌的奸细？”
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

traits.locale_text: “那位大人一直以来都很容易受到……腐化思想的影响。他没有兴趣管理他的属地，而且他渴望暴力，这种情况很久之前就引起了我的注意。”{n}卡尔卡扎犹豫片刻，之后补充道。{/n}“我唯一不清楚的问题是：他的随从之中，究竟混进了多少混沌大敌的奸细？”

languages.text: «Milord ha demostrado una cierta susceptibilidad a... ideas corruptoras desde hace mucho. Su pérdida de interés por la gestión de su protectorado y sus impulsos violentos atrajeron mi atención hace ya bastante tiempo». {n}Tras dudar un momento, Calcazar añade:{/n} «La pregunta no es si hay agentes del Archienemigo en su séquito, sino cuántos son».
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

traits.locale_text: «Milord ha demostrado una cierta susceptibilidad a... ideas corruptoras desde hace mucho. Su pérdida de interés por la gestión de su protectorado y sus impulsos violentos atrajeron mi atención hace ya bastante tiempo». {n}Tras dudar un momento, Calcazar añade:{/n} «La pregunta no es si hay agentes del Archienemigo en su séquito, sino cuántos son».

languages.text: 「陛下が長らく示していた傾向は…不健全な思想に影響されやすいということだ。保護領の管理に対する関心を失い、暴力的な欲求をふくらませては私の注意をひいていた時期がある」{n}少し逡巡してからカルカサルは続ける。{/n}「回答いただいていない質問がひとつだけある。渾沌の勢力のエージェントは、奴の側近に何人潜り込んでいるのか？」
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が長らく示していた傾向は…不健全な思想に影響されやすいということだ。保護領の管理に対する関心を失い、暴力的な欲求をふくらませては私の注意をひいていた時期がある」{n}少し逡巡してからカルカサルは続ける。{/n}「回答いただいていない質問がひとつだけある。渾沌の勢力のエージェントは、奴の側近に何人潜り込んでいるのか？」

languages.text: « Sa Seigneurie se montre depuis bien longtemps sensible aux... idées corruptrices. J'avais déjà remarqué son absence d'intérêt pour la gestion de son protectorat et sa soif de violence par le passé. » {n}Après une brève hésitation, Calcazar ajoute :{/n} « La seule question en suspens, c'est de savoir combien d'agents du Grand Ennemi se sont infiltrés dans son entourage. »
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

traits.locale_text: « Sa Seigneurie se montre depuis bien longtemps sensible aux... idées corruptrices. J'avais déjà remarqué son absence d'intérêt pour la gestion de son protectorat et sa soif de violence par le passé. » {n}Après une brève hésitation, Calcazar ajoute :{/n} « La seule question en suspens, c'est de savoir combien d'agents du Grand Ennemi se sont infiltrés dans son entourage. »

languages.text: "Seine Lordschaft war schon länger empfänglich für ... korrumpierende Ideen. Sein mangelndes Interesse an seinem Protektorat und sein Hang zur Gewalt haben schon vor einiger Zeit meine Aufmerksamkeit erregt." {n}Nach kurzem Zögern fährt Calcazar fort:{/n} "Die einzige noch unbeantwortete Frage lautet, wie viele Agenten des Erzfeinds sein Gefolge infiltriert haben."
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Lordschaft war schon länger empfänglich für ... korrumpierende Ideen. Sein mangelndes Interesse an seinem Protektorat und sein Hang zur Gewalt haben schon vor einiger Zeit meine Aufmerksamkeit erregt." {n}Nach kurzem Zögern fährt Calcazar fort:{/n} "Die einzige noch unbeantwortete Frage lautet, wie viele Agenten des Erzfeinds sein Gefolge infiltriert haben."

languages.text: "Lord Hazretleri epeydir... Böyle yoz fikirlere açık olmuştur. Protektorasını idare etmeye olan ilgisini kaybetmesi ve şiddet eğiliminin artması, dikkatimi bir süre evvel çekmişti." {n}Bir anlık tereddüdün ardından Calcazar, sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Burada cevapsız kalan tek soru, maiyetine Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarından kaçını sızdırdığıdır."
languages.original_text: "His Lordship has long displayed a susceptibility to... corrupting ideas. His loss of interest in managing his protectorate and his appetite for violence drew my notice some time ago." {n}After a moment's hesitation, Calcazar adds,{/n} "The only question that remains unanswered is how many agents of the Archenemy have infiltrated his entourage."
